alert.note: Alert for Southern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 7:19PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS... BEAUREGARD...NORTHERN CALCASIEU...ALLEN PARISHES IN SOUTHWESTERN LOUISIANA AND SOUTHWESTERN NEWTON COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CST... At 719 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Longville to near Gist. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, De Ridder, Oakdale, Westlake, Kinder, Oberlin, Reeves, Dry Creek, Singer, Deweyville, Moss Bluff, De Quincy, Ragley, Starks, Fields, Mittie, Grant, Lunita, and Topsy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
